markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Arqueros (The Golden Bulwark)](/Deities.aspx?ID=244)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="LG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 53</row>

As strong in will as he is in form, Arqueros is Lord of the Wall, guardian of [Heaven](/Planes.aspx?ID=17), and empyreal lord of bodyguards, protection, and watchfulness. He maintains eternal vigil at Heaven's gates, resplendent in gold armor and clutching a diamond-headed spear. Whatever the truth of his heart, Arqueros is composed in the face of dire threats and is a stalwart defender who would die before abandoning his duties.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Other Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=2)

**Edicts** protect those weaker than you; remain alert for danger; create, maintain, or patrol defenses

**Anathema** abandon others while you retreat, engage in needless destruction or bloodshed, intentionally fall asleep or grow lax on watch

**Area of Concern**
bodyguards, protection, watchfulness

**Follower Alignments**
LG, NG, LN

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Constitution

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

**Favored Weapon** [Spear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=10)

**Domains** [Duty](/Domains.aspx?ID=45), [Might](/Domains.aspx?ID=20), [Protection](/Domains.aspx?ID=27), [Zeal](/Domains.aspx?ID=37)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Family](/Domains.aspx?ID=11)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Endure](/Spells.aspx?ID=573)

- **4th**
[Stoneskin](/Spells.aspx?ID=312)
(appears as gold)

- **5th**
[Wall of Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=365)

</column>
name: Arqueros (The Golden Bulwark)
